g.text: 2.2.0. DFSP2 sends a Fulfil Reject Transfer request
DFSP2 sends a Fulfil Reject Transfer request
the quoting process or regenerate it using
: Payee rejection reason should be captured
in the extensionList within the payload.
Validate incoming token and originator matching Payee
Route & Publish Fulfil event for Payee
Ensure event is replicated as configured (ACKS=all)
Respond replication acknowledgements have been received
